title: Modern & newly build House
details:
Price: 45million
Property type: modern & newly build House
Area : 1st cross lane ,Templers Road , Mt Lavinia ( close to Siddalepa Hospital)
4 Bedrooms with 3 bathrooms and 01 additional room
Land size : 6.4 Perches
House size : 3662 sq ft
Floors : 3
Parking : 2 Vehicles
Floor type : Tiled & wooden
Garden & small courtyard: Yes
Solar Hot water system
3 Large lobbies / halls.
2 Large rooftop areas
Roller-door gate and wooden gate
All Doors, windows and stairways done using solid teak wood 
CCTV Camera
Master bedroom with A/C and large teak wardrobe
Three phase electricity
2 water tanks
Entire house made using bricks
Modern pantry cupboard with cooker set, oven
